docs.title: 1. Power up the gate
docs.text: Connect a 5V@3A power supply to the USB-C port at the bottom of the Stargate.

docs.title: 2. Connect to the Stargate web interface
docs.text: Open up the interface on a phone or a computer and connect the gate via Bluetooth. The interface can be used to control the gate, and it provides a way for the gate to play sound effects.

docs.title: 3. Power up the DHD
docs.text: Power up the DHD by pressing the button on the bottom side. To turn it off later, double tap the button.

docs.title: 4. Dial the gate!
docs.text: Just use random 7 symbols, for now :) Specific addresses coming in the future firmware together with a bunch of extra features.
